attributes.action: scrap all NHS charges to include presciption charges and dental treatment for ALL NHS employees
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In all walks of life there are always concessions handed out by most employers eg the rail services and free concessionary travel and concessionary flights for Airline employees . It is an absolute travesty that these low paid workers have to pay anything towards personal healthcare, when personnel from the armed services are given free healthcare through the forces.
